CustomField.description: When this value is true, holidays are not included in dates of the amortization schedule and no dues are generated on holidays. This feature is supported only for the contracts with Daily payment frequency.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: When this value is true, holidays are not included in dates of the amortization schedule and no dues are generated on holidays. This feature is supported only for the contracts with Daily payment frequency.
CustomField.label: Skip Holidays for Daily Loans
